Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 19 runs
Mohammed Siraj took 2 wickets for 50 runs
Hardik Pandya took 2 wickets for 34 runs
Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 35 runs
Ravindra Jadeja took 2 wickets for 38 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Jasprit Bumrah was awarded the Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the match by 7 wickets (with 117 balls remaining)
India maintained their unbeaten record against Pakistan in the ICC Cricket World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad
The match was a day-night match and was played on October 14, 2023
